content.text: Hey there! What are you up to?
Hey, not much! Just got back from the gym. How about you?
The gym! I am too lazy to work out these days. I am a first grade teacher and it's been a busy week.
Oh, that's so cool! I am a legal assistant in a law firm. I also have a side hustle where I sell jewelry made with crystals. I'm actually looking forward to going to a crystal shop this weekend.
That sounds like a fun weekend plan! I'm a psychology major and I love learning about the power of crystals. I'm also really into crystals.
That's awesome! I'm glad to meet another crystal enthusiast. My mom is my biggest inspiration and I'm grateful for my friends who have stayed by my side.
Me too! I'm really lucky to have such a supportive family and friends. What's your favorite thing about your job as a legal assistant?
I love working with my clients and helping them achieve their goals. It's also really rewarding to help people understand the legal system and their rights.
That's great! I'm sure you're a great legal assistant.
